reviewText: Couldn't believe I found it on Amazon after checking all other online availability there it was! Delivered perfectly on time I was finally able to share this hilarious video portraying life in Vermont just as I had come to know it with several business trips to the state.
Great watch for high school Sociology class and Vermont History. Most of the cast are real, local Vermonters. This video shows the paradox of moving out to the country.

This is a beautiful, joyous little movie which not only shows the glories of Vermont, but unfolds a nifty, unexpected plot which will have you chuckling and wishing you could live there too. Wonderful!  David B
